languages.text: "Резонно. Сложно избить человека до полусмерти так, чтобы это не увидела ни одна сволочь в отсеке. Займемся".
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."
languages.original_text: "Резонно. Сложно избить человека до полусмерти так, чтобы это не увидела ни одна сволочь в отсеке. Займемся".

traits.locale_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without every scumbag in the compartment getting wind of it. We will take a look."
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without every scumbag in the compartment getting wind of it. We will take a look."
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without every scumbag in the compartment getting wind of it. We will take a look."
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without every scumbag in the compartment getting wind of it. We will take a look."
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."
"That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."

languages.text: "Das macht Sinn. Man kann einen Mann nicht halbtot schlagen, ohne dass irgendjemand etwas bemerkt. Wir gehen der Sache nach."
languages.original_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."

traits.locale_text: "Das macht Sinn. Man kann einen Mann nicht halbtot schlagen, ohne dass irgendjemand etwas bemerkt. Wir gehen der Sache nach."

languages.text: « C'est logique. On ne peut pas tabasser un homme à mort, ou presque, sans que la moitié du compartiment ait vent de l'affaire. Nous allons nous pencher sur la question. »
languages.original_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."

traits.locale_text: « C'est logique. On ne peut pas tabasser un homme à mort, ou presque, sans que la moitié du compartiment ait vent de l'affaire. Nous allons nous pencher sur la question. »

languages.text: «Eso tiene sentido. No se puede moler a palos a un hombre sin que el resto del compartimento se entere de algún modo. Lo investigaremos».
languages.original_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."

traits.locale_text: «Eso tiene sentido. No se puede moler a palos a un hombre sin que el resto del compartimento se entere de algún modo. Lo investigaremos».

languages.text: 「たしかにそうですね。そんなことが起きていることを区画にいる誰にも気づかれることなく、人を半殺しにするなどできません。調べてみましょう」
languages.original_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."

traits.locale_text: 「たしかにそうですね。そんなことが起きていることを区画にいる誰にも気づかれることなく、人を半殺しにするなどできません。調べてみましょう」

languages.text: “您的看法很有道理。这个人被打得半死不活，这样的场面肯定有人亲眼看到了。我们会着手调查这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."

traits.locale_text: “您的看法很有道理。这个人被打得半死不活，这样的场面肯定有人亲眼看到了。我们会着手调查这件事情。”

languages.text: "Mantıklı. Kompartımandaki herkesin kulağına gitmeden bir insanı öldüresiye dövemezsin. Bu hususla ilgileneceğiz."
languages.original_text: "That makes sense. You cannot beat a man half to death without everyone in the compartment getting wind of such a scene. We will look into it."
